title: Finished and Won a Ranked Game  Now stuck at "You have left a game...."
body: I won a ranked game which was my last promo and was waiting for stats for 5mins plus realised it wouldn't load then realised i had not moved up division, i decided to logout and log back in to see if this would refresh the game, instead now i am stuck on the splash screen "you have left a game in progress. Please Reconnect the Game" i have attempted this and the game will then simply crash , i have tried to log in and out multiple times still no progress, i really don't want the game not to count it wouldn't really be fair

replies.body: Ive been out of a game for 3 hours and everytime I log in it tried to reconnect to it. when I click reconnect to game the client crashes. ive tried to leave and take the time penalty and it does nothing. HELP!
same here... i just didnt win promo with my 2nd win... it just disappeared as match..

From reading your post I went ahead and took a look into your account and I'm left fairly confused with your description and what our records show.  I am able to see that you are in a mini-series for promotion, but at the time you played your game, your mini series would have just started and would not have been the game that would have caused you to win your series.  However, at the same time it looks like a game is missing from your match history if it was played roughly 8 hours ago.  As to why the game is missing, it is hard to say -- the individual game server itself could have had an issue, dropping the game for everyone, or the game could have been attempted to be drop-hacked.  Either way, if the game is currently not in your match history, it will not appear in the future :(

As of right now, you are currently 1-1 in your series.  I wish you the best of luck in winning! :)
Run program as administrator and it should fix the problem, did for me anyways... finally.

I am also in the same situation. Everytime I open the client, it says reconnect to game, but my game finished like an hour ago. My friends say my status is not in game but when they invite, they say the player is in game. Any idea on how to unstuck my account?
